# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe could significantly enhance your endeavors or personal life. This item holds immense value to me, representing years of dedication and craftsmanship. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $500000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its potential impact on your life.

Please consider this proposal carefully. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am more than happy to discuss the details further.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $500,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $500,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
